 StringTree Discovery.getMembers(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String dimensionName)
          Returns a tree list of all members found within a given dimension, or null if the dimension You first specify which cube you're currently exploring via the Session.setCurrentCube() call.

 void Session.setCurrentQuery(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String queryId)
          Tells the backend that from now on, operations will be performed on the specified query.
